lesson.title: Time-Weighted Rewards
lesson.objective: Understand how protocols reward duration over size

sections.content: 30 days in DeFi separates tourists from participants. You've now held through market cycles, news events, and the constant temptation to react. This patience is the foundation of yield.

Time-weighted mechanisms distribute rewards proportionally to how long you've participated. A smaller deposit held longer often earns more than a large deposit held briefly. Time is the great equalizer.

content: Early withdrawal often means forfeiting accrued rewards
